description: The Tupolev Tu-4P is a propeller-driven night intercepter converted from the Tu-4 bomber. The NATO reporting name is Bull.
variantnotes: Dorsal Radar. In level flight, the radar may detect targets at equal or higher altitude, regardless of the altitude of the target, but may not detect targets at lower altitude. In diving or climbing flight, it may only detect targets at higher altitude.

Articulated Guns. The guns can fire in any direction. They may return fire twice per game turn in response to gun attacks or conduct one attack. The hit rolls are modified only by the target size and a -1 modifier when firing into the 60- arc.
loadnotes: No stores may be carried. The internal bomb bay is used to house an air-intercept control post.
